about: I am a Computer Engineering graduate with a strong passion for continuous learning and technological innovation. I am a self-driven and proactive professional, always eager to explore new technologies and solve complex challenges. In my free time, I enjoy video games, staying active, and expanding my knowledge through research and experimentation. I thrive in collaborative environments and am committed to delivering high-quality results.
work1: Contributed to the development team at Nativo, working with technologies such as Ruby on Rails, MongoDB, and AngularJS.
work2: Participated in the design and development of a web application at CTI, utilizing React to build responsive and modern interfaces.
work3: Collaborated as a volunteer developer for Plan21â€™s YvY project, a regenerative agriculture solution built with Angular, in partnership with IBM and ITCR.
work4: Worked as a freelance developer, building tailored web applications and websites for various clients.
work5: Currently working as a Fullstack Developer using tools and frameworks such as Docker, Angular, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, and more.
yvyproject: YvY is a web platform that helps farmers manage crops and access data related to weather, precipitation, and soil quality. It was built using the Angular framework.
portfolioproject: My personal portfolio, developed with Next.js, showcases my projects, skills, and professional background.
zulportfolio: Designed, developed, and deployed a modern, optimized website for a local artist using Astro and React.
blog: My personal blog, developed with Next.js, where I publish articles related to technology and software development.
